sentences.en: A lot of my grant goes on books.
sentences.cn: 我的许多补助金都花在书上.

sentences.en: Anyone wishing to apply for a grant should write to the Treasurer.
sentences.cn: 凡希望申请补助者，请致函财务主管。

sentences.en: Britain could grant Spain’s request .
sentences.cn: 英国可能会同意西班牙的请求。

sentences.en: Check whether you are entitled to a discretionary grant for your course.
sentences.cn: 确定你是否有权酌情行事。

sentences.en: Despite strenuous objections by the right wing, the grant was agreed.
sentences.cn: 尽管右翼分子极力反对，拨款还是通过了。

sentences.en: France has agreed to grant him political asylum.
sentences.cn: 法国已经同意给予他政治避难。

sentences.en: Grant's health steadily deteriorated.
sentences.cn: 格兰特的健康状况持续恶化。

sentences.en: He refused to grant them long - term credits.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝给他们 长期 信贷.

sentences.en: He took a risk, I'll grant you. But when you think about it, the risk was pretty small.
sentences.cn: 我承认他有些冒险，但是回过来想一想，其实风险并不大。

sentences.en: He’s got talent, I grant you , but he doesn’t work hard enough.
sentences.cn: 他有天赋，这不假，但是他不够努力。

sentences.en: I grant the truth of what he says.
sentences.cn: 我承认他说的是真的.

sentences.en: I grant you that there have been excesses here and there. But this happens in any popular national struggle.
sentences.cn: 我承认各地出现了一些过激行为，但是这种现象在任何大规模民族斗争中都在所难免。

sentences.en: I would love to be able to grant her wish.
sentences.cn: 我很希望能够满足她的愿望。

sentences.en: I'd be homeward bound even before Grant arrived.
sentences.cn: 我会在格兰特到来之前就已经启程回家了。

sentences.en: I'm getting a grant for a speech therapy course. But the thing is, I don't know whether I want to do it any more.
sentences.cn: 我要弄到开设言语治疗课程的经费了。但问题是，我不知道自己是否还想做下去。

sentences.en: If you grant my request, you will earn my thanks.
sentences.cn: 如果你答应我的要求, 就会得到我的感谢.

sentences.en: May God grant you pardon for your sins.
sentences.cn: 愿上帝宽恕你的罪过.

sentences.en: Meanwhile Grant held Lee before Richmond until Sherman closed on him.
sentences.cn: 同时格兰特把李牵制在里士满的前方,直到谢尔曼将他包围.

sentences.en: She won a grant to develop her own business.
sentences.cn: 她赢得了一笔拨款，用以扩展自己的企业。

sentences.en: Single parents tend to grant more independence to their children than other parents do.
sentences.cn: 单亲父母往往比其他父母给予孩子们更多的自主性。

sentences.en: the comforts that people take for granted.
sentences.cn: 人们认为是理所当然的舒适。

sentences.en: The university gets a government grant.
sentences.cn: 这所大学获得政府拨款。

words.tran_cn: 出让方；出让人；授与者；转让者

phrases.tran_cn: 政府批地书，政府补助金
休·格兰特（知名电影演员）
政府赠地；政府拨给大学或铁路之土地
等额津贴，半费资助；同额资助

phrases.phrase: take someone or something for granted
phrases.tran_cn: 对熟悉（或明显）的人（或物）视作当然

trans.tran_en: an amount of money given to someone, especially by the government, for a particular purpose
to admit that something is true although it does not make much difference to your opinion

trans.tran_cn: 授予， 给予； 同意
trans.tran_en: to give someone something or allow them to have something that they have asked for
